text: Ara ye tara matapitake bale -- ''dhuttora tomadera jan'ya! Tomara ki amake bhaya dekhaccha ye amake bera kara habe, athaca amara age bahu manababansa gata haye'i geche? Ara tara dujane allah‌ra sahayya kamana karabe -- ''dhik tomara jan'ya! Imana ano, allah‌ra oyada abasya'i satya.’’ Kintu se bale -- ''eto atitakalera upakatha chara ara kichu'i naya.’’
